div.p: Zenon to Kleon, greetings. The water in the canal has not risen more than a cubit, so that the land cannot be irrigated from it. Please, open the sluice gates so that the land can be irrigated. Farewell. [Year 30, Loios] 23, Mesore 23.
[Year 30, Mes]ore 24. To Kleon [...] water. Translation: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 59, Â© Peeters
